getAllStudentsInSchool

public java.util.ArrayList<Student> getAllStudentsInSchool()

Returns:

getSeniors

public java.util.ArrayList<Student> getSeniors()
Precondition: there is at least one student in the school. Postcondition: returns an ArrayList of all the seniors in the school
